detections.label: <<FORMULA_0417>>
detections.formula:
\begin{split}
                        \snorm{p\cP - p_0\cD_{X,Y(0)}}_1
                    &\coloneqq 
                    \iint \abs{p(x,y)\cP(x,y)-p_0(x,y)\cD_{X,Y(0)}(x,y)}\d x\d y
                     \leq \eps \,,\\
                    \snorm{q\cQ - p_1\cD_{X,Y(1)}}_1
                    &\coloneqq 
                    \iint \abs{p(x,y)\cP(x,y)-p_1(x,y)\cD_{X,Y(1)}(x,y)}\d x\d y
                     \leq \eps \,.
                    \end{split}
                    \yesnum\label{eq:techOverview:est:2}
detections.error_description: In the second integral, functions p and cP are used instead of q and cQ

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0932>>
